rules_text:
The Realm of Dreams enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
{3}{U}{B}{R}, {T}: Transform The Realm of Dreams.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Malvoros, exile the top two cards of each player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]The Realm of Dreams grows darker by the year, thanks to its tyrannical king.[/i]
